markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="">[Tireless Worker](/Spells.aspx?ID=560)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 65</row>

**Domain**
[Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained for up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that’s affecting the target: [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15). If you don’t remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell’s duration expires.
name: Tireless Worker
